all-packages.description: Documentation for all the packages that are included in the SMILKit engine.

all-classes.description: Documentation for all the classes that are included in the SMILKit engine, includes syntax, usage information and some code samples for the various methods, properties and events inside the SMILKit API.

package.name: org.smilkit
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit package is the base package used in SMILKit.
package.description: The org.smilkit package is the base package used in SMILKit.

package.name: org.smilkit.collections
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.collections package contains the classes for list / array collections.
package.description: The org.smilkit.collections package contains the classes for list / array collections.

package.name: org.smilkit.dom
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.dom package contains the implementation classes for the W3C DOM.
package.description: The org.smilkit.dom package contains the implementation classes for the W3C DOM.

package.name: org.smilkit.dom.events
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.dom.events package contains the implementation classes of the W3C DOM event bindings.
package.description: The org.smilkit.dom.events package contains the implementation classes of the W3C DOM event bindings.

package.name: org.smilkit.dom.smil
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.dom.smil package contains the implementation classes SMIL Boston DOM.
package.description: The org.smilkit.dom.smil package contains the implementation classes SMIL Boston DOM.

package.name: org.smilkit.events
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.events package contains classes that define non-dom event objects.
package.description: The org.smilkit.events package contains classes that define non-dom event objects.

package.name: org.smilkit.handler
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.handler package contains the classes for asset handler functionality, and includes the SMILKit default handlers.
package.description: The org.smilkit.handler package contains the classes for asset handler functionality, and includes the SMILKit default handlers.

package.name: org.smilkit.parsers
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.parsers package contains the classes that are responsible for parsing an XML document.
package.description: The org.smilkit.parsers package contains the classes that are responsible for parsing an XML document to the SMILKit DOM implementation.

package.name: org.smilkit.render
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.render package contains the classes used for rendering and positioning objects on the stage.
package.description: The org.smilkit.render package contains the classes used for rendering and positioning objects on the stage.

package.name: org.smilkit.time
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.time package contains classes that handle timing in SMILKit including time resolution.
package.description: The org.smilkit.time package contains classes that handle timing in SMILKit including time resolution.

package.name: org.smilkit.util
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.util package contains a collection of utility classes and helpers.
package.description: The org.smilkit.util package contains a collection of utility classes and helpers, includes a Logger, Object cloning helpers and URL parser.

package.name: org.smilkit.util.logger
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.util.logger package contains the classes that provide logging functionality to SMILKit.
package.description: The org.smilkit.util.logger package contains the classes that provide logging functionality to SMILKit.

package.name: org.smilkit.view
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.view package contains classes that provide view functionality, these provide high level support for embedding SMILKit.
package.description: The org.smilkit.view package contains classes that provide view functionality, these provide high level support for embedding SMILKit.

package.name: org.smilkit.w3c
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.w3c package contains the W3C bindings.
package.description: The org.smilkit.w3c package contains the W3C bindings.

package.name: org.smilkit.w3c.dom
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.w3c.dom package contains the W3C DOM Level 2 bindings.
package.description: The org.smilkit.w3c.dom package contains the <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/REC-DOM-Level-2-Core-20001113/">W3C DOM Level 2</a> bindings.

package.name: org.smilkit.w3c.dom.events
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.w3c.dom.events package contains the event class bindings from the W3C Level 2 DOM.
package.description: The org.smilkit.w3c.dom.events package contains the event class bindings from the W3C Level 2 DOM.

package.name: org.smilkit.w3c.dom.smil
package.shortDescription: The org.smilkit.w3c.dom.smil package contains the interface bindings based on the W3C SMIL 3.0 Boston DOM.
package.description: The org.smilkit.w3c.dom.smil package contains the interface bindings based on the <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/smil-boston-dom/cover.html">W3C SMIL 3.0 Boston DOM</a> bindings.
